title: Floral Elixir Co. Cherry Blossom Elixir - All Natural Syrup for Cocktails & Sodas
features: Enjoy the rich flavors of cherry blossoms with delicate wild cherry, floral and almond undertones in this concentrated syrup
ALL NATURAL - no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives, made from pure cane sugar with 36 calories per serving
Cocktails & sodas: add to spirits, champagne, sparkling waters, teas
Each bottle has at least 17 servings with illustrated recipes on the back
Women-owned, handmade in the USA in small batches.
description: Since 2009, Floral Elixir Co. has been handcrafting all natural flower syrups made from real flowers and botanicals. With a lightly sweet and citrus balance, they have rich flavors, delicious aromas and jewel-like colors, derived from real flowers and botanicals from around the world. For home mixologists, cocktail aficionados and flower enthusiasts, our Elixirs are delicious as cocktails when added to spirits and champagne, and make wonderful sodas and teas.

title: How to Make a White Wine Spritzer
How to Make a Botanical Soda with Hops Elixir
